name: This product name is exactly fifty characters long
description: This is a very long product description that tests the maximum allowed character limit for the description field in the product update API endpoint to ensure proper validation

Title: Name too long
name: This product name is way too long and exceeds the maximum allowed character limit for product names in the system which should cause validation error
Expected_Message: The name may not be greater than 255 characters

Title: Description too long
name: Product Name
description: This product description is extremely long and exceeds the maximum allowed character limit for product descriptions in the system. It contains way too much text that should trigger a validation error when submitted to the API endpoint because it violates the maximum length constraint set by the system validation rules. This text continues to exceed reasonable limits.
Expected_Message: The description may not be greater than 1000 characters
